ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 22 items, Camera & lenses includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories & Warranty, Additional accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS APS-C Sensor DIGIC 4 Image Processor Full-HD Movie Mode Digital SLR Camera with 3.0-Inch Clear View Vari-Angle LCD (Body) - Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens - Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens
0.43X HD Wide Angle w/case - 2.2X HD Telephoto Lenses w/case - 2 UV (Ultraviolet) Protection Filters - CPL (Circular Polarizer) Filter - FLD (Fluorescent) Filter - 3 slot Filter Case - 32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card
Additional LP-E8 Rechargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery Pack - SLR Camera Multi-Compartment Gadget Bag with Pockets & Neck Strap - SD USB Memory Card Reader - 12 Slot Foldable Memory Card Case
Full Sized Pro Series 60" Tripod with Case - HDMI Cable for High Definition TV connection - 5pc. Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth (the most effective way to clean all optical surfaces)
